hypothesis_content.title: Binance APR Offer Catalyst Amplification in Low-Liquidity Alts
hypothesis_content.statement: Following Binance's 20% APR offer announcement on USD1, similar high-yield announcements on other low-cap, low-liquidity stablecoins or yield-bearing tokens will trigger asymmetric 5-15% pumps within 2 hours, amplified by the current neutral regime's search for yield.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes with low volatility see capital rotate quickly into high-yield narratives. The USD1 pump demonstrates retail's appetite for yield in a low-rate crypto environment. Low liquidity amplifies moves as market makers are caught off-guard.
entry_conditions: Binance (or other Tier-1 CEX) announces >15% APR offer on a token with <$50M market cap and <$2M 24h volume
Token price has been flat or down (<±2%) for preceding 24h
Announcement occurs between 08:00-14:00 UTC (overlap of EU/US trading)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry or 2 hours after entry, whichever comes first
exit_conditions.time_exit: 4 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: >70% of similar announcements in next 14 days fail to generate >5% move within 4 hours, or median return is <3%.
